channel.title: palaniappan on Gopi Palaniappan
channel.description: Recent content in palaniappan on Gopi Palaniappan

item.description: Gopi Palaniappan - Exploring Innovation Welcome to my personal website! I’m Gopi Palaniappan, a Technical Program Manager at Google Inc. My career journey has been a fusion of innovation and creativity. Here’s a glimpse of my exciting path. The Google Voyage Android XR Platform: At Google, I’ve been at the forefront of the Android XR platform, driving next-gen headset development. I’ve specialized in system software, perception platform, and power and performance optimization.
